task: Test double ENTER key to handle paste confirmation dialog

test_details.test_purpose: Verify double ENTER handles paste confirmation and submission

fix_description.problem: Paste confirmation dialog consumes first ENTER key
fix_description.solution: Send two ENTER keys with 250ms delay between them
fix_description.logic: First ENTER confirms paste, second ENTER submits prompt

visual_confirmation.after_first_enter: Dialog closes, prompt visible in field

RESPONSE: RECOMMENDATION: TEST - .\Test-ENTERKeySubmission.ps1: Test the double ENTER key fix that handles the paste confirmation dialog. First ENTER (after 500ms) confirms the paste operation, second ENTER (after 250ms) submits the prompt. This ensures complete automation without the paste dialog blocking submission.
